content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in a glass enclosed room reading (i was recovering from surgery and could not sleep).  my husband was watching johnny carson on our bedroom tv.  i heard a deep droning (very heavy sounding but not loud)
noise.  i got up and looked out back but didn't see anything and i thought that maybe someone was gunning an engine way off in the distance.  i sat back down and continued to read for a good bit when my husband came running through the house saying it was hovering over our house.  we went out side and looked up and saw a ufo shaped like flying wings( sharper shape than a boomerang)with colored lights across the back of both wing sides.   it  made very little sound except for the deep humming.  it moved off directly east.  as it went over our neighbors barn ( a 2 story barn with a long milking building attached about 100 to 125 feet), it was longer than the length of the barn and milking building and if i had stood on the roof i could have reached up and rubbed the bottom of the craft.  it moved off so slowly that i could have kept up with it at a fast walk.  we live in a very rural area.
content.summary: Vehicle hovered above our house for about 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving west on i-80 through utah around late afternoon, between 4-4:30pm.  i was sitting in the passenger seat of the car and i saw a small black dot against the sky.  there were clouds in the sky, but no excessive cloud cover.  we thought it might have been a blimp or a hot air balloon at first; we were probably a good 5-8 miles away from where this object seemed to be hovering over.  i took a picture of it as a joke saying we found a ufo on our way out to california.  after a few minutes driving on the highway we ended up being on the left-hand side of this object, due to turns in the road.  when i looked up again at the object, it was no longer black...It appeared white, almost as if it was relecting the sunlight.  my friend thought it appeared to be in the shape of a fish, and i thought it had looked like a space shuttle.  there was wind blowing around while we were driving, so we found it bizarre how this object didn't seem to sway back and forth.  also, it did not ascend, descent, make any sudden turns, anything to indicate some sort of movement.  even as we were driving away from it, it still seemed to just stay in the same spot it was in when i first noticed it.
content.summary: Strange hovering dot found while driving west on i-80 in utah

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:15pm est on sept. 15th, 2011 my wife and i had pulled over along i-78 nearing the town of hellertown in pennsylvania. there we had witnessed an extraordinary sight that we could not explain. above the sky we had witnessed what appeared at first to be an odd plane- odd since the lighting on it did not seem to match anything that we had seen on planes around the area. we had pulled over on the side of the road to observe this strange light (yellow-gold in colour)which, as it had approached, appeared to have oscillating lights mounted on it's metallic hull. we had observed the object for an approximate 8-10 minutes when it had subsequently glided effortlessly over top of us, proceeding past the nearby treeline and off into the distance. the object seemed to be metallic in nature, with three couplings (think jet engine-esque) which appeared to house three large yellow-gold lights. upon observing the object past the treeline it appeared to begin making jerky movements overtop of the city of allentown close by. the object had dissappeared past the treeline from sight and we had decided to begin heading out when we had witnessed several more of the same type of yellow gold lights in the distance. these were dismissed as being planes at first but upon closer inspection these objects had the same strange oscillating light patterns that we had observed in the first object. we had observed these objects for quite some time, one of them had begun dimming and subsequently re-igniting so to speak in an apparent timed manner. the included microsoft paint doodle is the best rendition i can create of the underside of the craft that had passed over us. if anyone has any news regarding these sightings please feel free to contact me.A
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo spotted above i-78 near hellertown, flies over couple.

content.detailedDescription: I was an art instructor (college level) teaching night classes.  i also was a business owner.  i dropped off a student at about 10:00 pm and stayed for a cup of coffee before leaving for a late night at my business with my partner.  it takes about 35 to 40 minutes to travel from my students home to my business.  i stopped to pick up a candy bar for my partner at a 7-11 as i had promised.  as i came within 150 feet of the graveyard entrance a ufo shot down from left (11 o'clock angle) to right (4 o'clock angle). i at first thought it was a small plane crashing but as it got to within approximately 30 feet of hitting the road in front of me it slowed and shot upward at a sharp angle.  all i could see were 5 large lights ( blinding bright) that blinked from left to right continuously as if on a circlular object.  i pulled into the entry of the graveyard and got out of my car.  it was hovering at tree hight(60 to 80 foot tall pine trees) near the edge of the graveyard and almost above the only house on that side of the road at that time.  then it moved off and i jumped back in my car and followed it down the road as it moved just above the trees and power lines in a sort of swinging or zig zag movement while the white lights continued to blink in a spinning pattern.  i chased it for about 3/4 of a mile and then it moved out over fields toward i-85/40.  when i arrived at my business, just another 1/2 mile away, it was near 3:00 am.  i have been bothered by this for years and just wanted it reported while i am still alive.  in the early part of 1988 i had a secon encounter with something completely different while recovering from surgery.  i will report it in another post.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Chased a ufo and several hours missing time.

content.detailedDescription: I came home about 8:45 p.M. and looked in the sky and saw two "aircraft" with blinking lights flying to my left and then right and crisscrossing paths.  then one object flashed a string of very bright light, almost like daylight and it went in sequence from left to right and kept pulsating.  it looked like a blinking lights sort of like the way a lighted cigarette will look in a dark room when moved very fast and it looks like it leaves a trail.  the objects went back and forth varying in elevation.  i know that the objects weren't that hight because when the lights were flashing they lighted up the tops of the trees.  i watched this for about 45 minutes with a friend and we couldn't figure out what it was.  i was reminded of the blinking lights seen over mexico city.  they flew back and forth, much faster than the aircraft we saw during the incident, then they flew behind a tree and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second time these have been seen in the last six months 
both times the official explanation is flares even though they stay stationary
content.summary: This copy of the video explains  http://www.Youtube.Com/user/raretradu

content.detailedDescription: I was going to go outside to see if i would see anymore ufo's, and sure enough i did. i was about to step outside, and i was looking through our back door (faces south) and i could see a white orb hovering due south of us. i asked my mom to take a look at it, and she thought it was a plane, but i wasn't sure, so i ran back to my room to grab my new camcorder and then i ran back into the kitchen and looked at the clock because i broke my phone earlier, it said 9:16 pm edt. i stepped outside, and i walked to our back yard, on the edge of the field and started taking video. i could still see the white orb hovering above the tree line to my south. then a second object appeared out of nowhere, to my south-southeast, and began heading west at a pretty good speed, i'm guessing between 300 and 500 mph and was about 500 feet above the ground. it was fairly bright, it was white and did not pulsate or blink, but remained constant. it went behind a farm that had three large grain silos, but i never did see the object again, so obviously it disappeared behind the silos. the first object began to slowly move northeastward. it took roughly 10 minutes for it to travel from my due south to my due east. i turned around to check the sky to the north, and thats when i saw yet a 3rd object coming from the north, so i started walking fast to the north of our house, i stood there for about 2 or 3 minutes, and this object got closer to me, and thats when i realized that it was just a jet with it's landing lights on heading into the evansville airport. right then, a 4th object, a white orb appeared to my north. it was hovering above vincennes, in, between 200 and 500 feet in altitude. the 1st object was now to my east-northeast, and was still moving northeastwards. the 4th object was stationary for about 5 minutes, and then began to move westward. it moved west at about 100 mph, and remained at it's same altitude as it was when it was over vincennes. another 5 to 7 minutes past when it got to my north-northwest, where it began to rapidly descend and got very bright, about as bright as jupiter or venus. it then began to head back east, again at about 100 mph, but was much lower in altitude, less then 200 feet. this is where it gets a little strange. it started to descend to the north-northwest, to the point where it was at the tree line. then it went behind the trees, where i lost sight of it. that's when yet a 5th object appeared to the northwest, it appeared slightly orange, but mainly white, and was about 500 to 800 feet in altitude and was also heading east. shortly after, about a minute or 2 later, the 4th object reappeared above the tree line, as if it saw the 5th object approaching. then i saw a 6th orb, a very bright white light, that i saw for just a second, it came on, and went back off, but i know it was not a flare, because i watch f16's practice their dog fights during the day and at night, and i've seen them drop flares, they are orange and slowly descend, and last about 2 or 3 minutes. the 4th object picked up speed and started rapidly increasing in altitude and headed east about 50 or 100 mph. the 5th object quickly caught up to the other object, to the point where they were only about a mile and a half apart from each other. then both objects stopped, and hovered for about a minute, and object number 4 faded away, but the other object began moving eastward again. right then, i looked up and saw a triangular object, simalar to the other triangles that i've witnessed in the past. a red blinking light in the center, with 3 white lights (not blinking or pulsating) in a triangular formation. there were some pulsating lights on the rear, but i could not see a specific pulsating pattern, but they pulsated regularly at about once per second. this object was making a turn towards the left and was begenning to head north-northeast at about 200 or 300 mph, towards the white orb near vincennes, as if it was going to check out the orb. both objects were now heading northeast. i was filming for almost the entire time. from about 9:17 pm edt to 10:09 pm edt. i finally lost visual of the orb, and lost visual of the triangle about 5 minutes after i lost visual of the orb. i did not see anything afterwards. this was certainly the most objects i've ever witnessed in one night, in about an hour i saw about 4. i did manage to take 2 photos of orb number 4 to my north before my camera batteries died (i didn't bring any extra batteries) and i managed to take a very long video, (over 30 minutes long) although the majority of the objects did not show up in the video, at times i did actually get some of the objects on video (i don't remember exactly which ones i captured). i am hoping mufon can do some examining of my photos and video that i attempt to send in. i will have to send my video in some other time due to our very slow dial up internet connection, i will attempt to upload the 2 photos that i took. i looked at my photos and both photos do have what appears to be the white orb, it is almost in the very center of both photos, but you have to zoom in a few times in order to see it.
content.summary: At least 6 orbs and 1 triangle near vincennes, in

content.detailedDescription:
I can go for my binoculars, and we watch whit other clouse neightbour.
afther like, ten minutes, the sphere go of, very fast, to the sky in one second, whit out eny noise. the sphere apear static over the street, and hours aftehr we remember... the cars.. there is not transit in the street in that 10 minutes of.. wherever appends.  sorry my ingles.
content.summary: Estatic sphere ligthing all over the place. i can watch they structural form, we can see them, whit out flash in our eyes, very clear. the surface changig, like the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
See : (link removed) cms 09/15/11 20:12 cst flg
this is the first time i have ever noticed these lights around fukushima. check it out. maybe someone has an explanation ?
content.summary: Currently observing lights in the sky over the fukushima on the live youtube broadcast.

content.detailedDescription:
Here is the statement that i wrote down the morning after the incident as soon as i woke up (names have been omitted and a few details have been added in parenthesis for further explanation): 

last night i experienced one of the freakiest events i have ever witnessed. my husband and i got back from a walk with our dog at approximately 9:45pm, then we went and sat on my mother in law's back porch to enjoy the night and just talk. (we were visiting my mother in law in oakland, tn but we lived in nashville at the time.) we were outside for about 10-15 minutes when on the horizon a bright orange light appeared out of nowhere right above the tree line in the field behind the house. it grew brighter to a rich amber color, then dimmed to a white light, all while hovering in the same place it first appeared. then, it began to move erratically, shooting straight up, straight down, and suddenly from side to side. it then proceeded to fly to our left (west toward memphis and the mississippi river), stopped over the field, and hovered there for 30-60 seconds. it then began flying toward us and flew diagonally above the house. we clearly saw three big lights and several smaller lights on the underbelly of the craft. it was clearly not an airplane for it had no wings and no tail- it was a solid craft in a triangular shape. it flew very close to us, yet we heard no noise coming from it. we could not believe what we were seeing with our own eyes.

we watched the craft until it was out of eyesight. it flew southwest toward memphis/mississipi. we sat on the back porch again completely shocked and astonished over what we had just seen. it was difficult to accept. not two minutes later another light appeared in the same spot the first one appeared, and it did the exact same thing as craft #1. it began as an orange light that quickly grew brighter into an amber color, then dimmed to a white light- all while hovering in the same spot. it also flew west, stopped, and hovered in the exact same spot over the field as the first. the field where they appeared and then proceeded to hover over is behind the house which is on a five acre lot. this field that is behind the house is a total of 296 acres of unoccupied farmland. craft #2 hovered in that field for 60-90 seconds before flying erratically around, appearing to bounce around in the night sky. then it flew directly west across the horizon.

while craft #2 was still in view, a third craft appeared in exactly the same spot and same fashion. it appeared as an orange light, grew to a bright amber, then into a bright white light, flew west and hovered over the same spot in the field as the others. it hovered there for 2-3 minutes. again, it began to also move erratically like it was dancing in the sky. it flew in pretty much the same flight path as craft #1, diagonally over the house. we could clearly see the underbelly lights and it���s triangular shape. like the first, it produced minimal to no noise. diagonally it was about 1- 1.5 football fields away.

at this point we were in complete shock and disbelief. i called my friend (name withheld) to describe the three crafts we had seen. while on the phone with her, a fourth craft appeared in the exact same manner as the first three. it followed the same path as craft #2 which flew directly west across the horizon. while watching craft #4, a fifth craft flew from the west over our heads due east. it was less than a football field above us and was about 15 degrees lower than being directly above our heads. this craft was the one we could see the clearest with our own eyes. it was a triangular craft with three white lights in the middle, and blue and red lights on the sides. even though it was so close to us, we still heard no noise.

at that point, my mother in law got binoculars for us to use. the crafts kept appearing in the exact same fashion. over the course of one and a half hours, we saw a total of 33-35 crafts. i kept count until we reached the 30th craft, and we saw several more after that. at the time we saw the 20th to 21st craft, we could see six in the sky at one time. three were hovering for several minutes right above the tree line, so still they could be mistaken for stars. the three others were flying in the sky. we began looking at the crafts through binoculars starting with the 6th craft. my husband and i each saw around 20 crafts through the binoculars. we could see them very clearly. approximately half the crafts were in a triangular shape and the other half were circular in shape. the triangular shaped crafts had three lights in the middle while red and blue lights on the edges, and the circular shaped crafts had one light in the middle with white, red, and blue lights around the circumference. crafts #1 and #3 flew southwest towards memphis/ mississippi, most of the crafts including #2 and #4 flew directly west towards memphis/ arkansas, one flew directly south toward mississippi, and a couple flew east toward nashville.
the crafts began appearing pretty quickly from about the 10th craft on, with six being seen at one time around the 20th craft. after about the 20th craft, they began slowing down in their appearance and we began seeing about three to four in the sky at one time. around 11:00 pm i had counted 30 crafts. we went inside around 15 minutes later, and one appeared right before we went in. there���s no telling when they stopped.
i am in shock and in disbelief, but i know what we saw. it truly was the weirdest night of my life!

that was the actual written account the morning after the incident. the day after the sightings my husband and i put on old clothes, got our dog and camera ready, and set out on a journey to find the area where most of the crafts appeared from. we found the field and were pleasantly surprised to find evidence. among the green grass field, we found three distinct spots that were abnormal. they were large, swirled patterns of dead grass. we took lots of pictures and video. that night we decided to camp out again to see if they returned. they sure enough did! we had our binoculars and video camera. the video camera picked up the lights in the sky and our audio story as we saw the crafts, but it isn't the best quality visually. one of the crafts that night flew directly over the house from the back door to the front door due south, only about 300 feet above our heads. again, we could clearly see details of the triangular craft. we also could see details with our binoculars. this event has changed our lives.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over 30 triangular crafts seen during an hour and a half time span

content.detailedDescription: In february this year i observed what looked like a star in the sky. i know for a fact it wasnt a star cuz it started at one part of the sky and went to the other and then back again and then up and then down then to the left again then back to the right eventually. then after that it went back to the left of the sky it stopped for about a minute and just floated there. after a minute of hovering there a long streak came out of the side of it and all the way down to the ground behind the houses it was floating over. the streak didnt return to the ufo.. it just came out of it and went to the ground and dissappeared.. then after sitting there for another 5 seconds it continued to move around again. thats when i decided to run in and grab my little brother's camera. the camera had a hard time focusing so i had to keep moving the camera to keep the ufo in focus. i will send two videos that i took of it.
content.summary: Star shaped. moved all accross the sky. back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
August 11, 2011 5:30 a.M.- noticed a star moving up from northwestern sky horizan then stopped. it stayed in same position for 1 hour. looked through binoculars and the "star" changed color from red,green, yellow and white.
august 17, 2011- 11:00 p.M."color changing star" was in northeastern sky. did not witness movement.
august 21, 2011 9:30 p.M.- went outside to look for "color changing moving star" in southwestern sky and noticed orange orb like glowing lights hovering around treeline in field by my house. there were about 2 or 3 moving in and out of tree line. not moving like anything i had ever seen compared to our aircraft. there ae powerlines between our house and the treeline.
august 22, 2011 - 5:30 a.M. "star" was present in northeastern sky, but located in a higher postition. no movement witnessed.
august 23, 2011 - 9:30 p.M. 2 orange orbs appeared in the treeline in the same field in the back of my house. this night i zoomed in on one and video recorded it. it appears to look like a plasma fireball changing colors. when i play the video, there is a strange high frequency techno sound recorded. this was not audible to my ear at the time i was recording.
august 26, 2011 9:45 p.M. orbs show up in smae treeline area. this time we showed them to my neighbor. i also showed him the video with the strange audio.
august 28, 2011 9:20p.M. orbs were visible in same treeline again. this time there were more thatn i had ever seen. maybe 4 or so. our power went out in the whole neighborhood for 2 hours on a clear night. i was watching more of these orbs coming down from sky into treeline. one orb started glowing white and getting larger and closer to our house. i was upstairs at this time and informed my husband of this. we got the kids and went downstairs. the light was so bright and big and almost to our house. it was silent. by the time it flew overhead, it made a noise like a plane. i looked to the other side of the house where it flew over and it was gone. this light was so bright, but did not hurt our eyes to look at it.
august 30, 2011 9:30- orbs are back as usual.
sept. 2, 2011- 6:00a.M. orbs in the morning now, leaving treeline, imitating plane lights as they head into the sky.
septemeber 3, 2011- 10:00 a.M.- 3 military helicopters are flying over wooded area and field.
september 4, 2011- evening sometime. next door neighbors said they saw  about 8-10 chinese lanterns in northeast sky.
septemeber 12, 2011- 6:35 a.M. orb imitating plane and headed back into sky. this day a small yellow plane flew over my house and neighborhood, over field and treeline about 10 or more times.
september 13, 2011 6:45 a.M. orb turned into fake plane and headed into sky. small yellow plane flew over same path or route about 10 times again.
september 15, 2011 6:45a.M. two orbs hovered over treeline then imitated planes. one of the orbs got really bright white as i tried to record it, then imitated a plane and flew off into sky.
content.summary: Orange/orb balls hover over woods, changing size and shape, come from sky and imitiate planes.

content.detailedDescription:
Was with mother in law in my vehicle on s. oxford valley rd going north to fairless hills. i remember reading about a sighting in fairless hills in the local newspaper a day or so earlier about a man seeing an object in the sky. the date i submitted is not approximate as i cannot remember even what month this was. my wiper blade flew off and radio died. it was sprinkling so i pulled into the turning lane. i got out and instinctly looked up at it without even looking for my wiper. i did not know it was there before i looked up. it was huge--wider then 2-3 football fields. i could see windows. i called for my mother in law to get out and look up. she saw it too and i must have asked her 100 times if she really see's it and asked her to describe what she saw. she described exactly what i was seeing. what i did not understand was why no-one else was pulling over because it was clearly visible right above the trees and this major roadway which was very busy with traffic and why was this huge object not making any noise. it stood stationary for about 10 minutes then it abruptly too off so fast that the only thing we could make out was a colorful snake-like trail. we jumped in the car an sped to follow it. we lost sight of it just before reaching morrisville, pa. it simply disappeared in the sky. i pulled over to collect my thoughts and i could not validate what this object was. 
i could not sleep as i felt like something was watching me. i'd open my eyes to find nothing there. the very next night i had the same sensation and opened my eyes. right next to my bed were 3 beings. each one a different size. i immediately panicked and slid sideways til i was under my husband screaming. i believe i was abducted as i remember details but will not go into that on here. after that experience, i remember being in my bed once more and i slid sideways under my husband and was screaming. he awoke and told me i had a nightmare & to go back to sleep. 
there has got to be more witnesses to this sighting besides the two of us.
content.summary: It was huge. i could see what looked like windows. i could not believe that no one else was pulling over--it was directly over a major rd which was busy. stationary for 10 min then it abruptly took off fast and then looked like a colorful snake-like objec

content.detailedDescription: To whom it may concern:   my wife and i were spending the weekend at a  motel in montauk, ny.  on friday, sept.09,2011 my wife was sitting on the terrace while i was watching television in the livingroom.  she began calling me to come see something in the sky as she had no idea as to what it could be.  the sky was crystal clear with a full cpmpllment of stars.  at approximately 21:15 hrs. i stepped onto the terrace, from which we had a 180 degree unobstucted view of the sky and a eastern, western and southern view of the  atlantic ocean. i observed a cylindrical or disc shaped object with a bright yellow to orange color radiating above below the full length of the object.  it appeared to be travelling at a speed greater than a passenger jet from west to east.  i raised my i-4 cell phone to get a picture of the object but i was afraid of losing sight of the object and refrained from doing so.  the object disappeared into the eastern sky. as my wife and i continued watching the skies we never thought we would see such a sight again.  to our amazement at approximately 21:30 hrs. the same or another identical object appeared from the northwest sky, continuing south and then turning towards the east.  it appeared to be travelling at the same rate of speed.  we observed it until it disappeared into the eastern sky.  my wife received a phone call and exited the terrace and answered the call in the bedroom.  i remained on the terrace in awe of what we had just witnessed.  i continued to watch the sky and at approximately 21:50 hrs. for the third time i observed another or same object travelling from the northern sky heading south and turning towards the east.  when it was almost directly in front of where i was standing on the terrace observing this object in the distance the object made a sudden stop or right turn to the the south.  it then proceeded to travel upward into the sky in a steep climb, at a tremendous rate of speed.  i still have to catch my breath thinking of what i had just witnessed three times in one night, never mind in a lifetime.  this was not imagined or a dream, it was real and will never be forgotten.
content.summary: Yellow to orange colors radiating above and below a cylindrical or disc shaped object traveling at a high rate to an extremely high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
On the way to a store i took a pic of the moon last year. and a few days ago i was looking at the pic, deciding whether or not to discard the pic. that's when i noticed the two lights in the corner of the pic. could these be stars? or a part of a constilation? or is this a ufo? i dont know..

i think i was abducted a week before my 23rd bday in june this year.. i had a reeeeeeally weird 'dream' and then i woke up with a burn on my left eyeball. a deep burn. a few friends pointed out that it looked like it was in the shape of a left eyeball.. so i did some research and it turns out that the sumerian people used to use a left eyeball symbol for the alien god nanna, the alien god of the moon...
content.summary: Two lights

content.detailedDescription: So how do i start the craziest story i've ever told? well here it is, me and my girl were leaving carlsbad caverns and headed back to texas at around midnight possiblyy in appr of 09'. i started to doze off at the wheel and told her i was going tool pull over as soon as we. pass all these construction barrels that were blocking the shoulder of the pitch black highway. about 30 minutes of nothing but bright orange traffic barrels there is finally an opening and we pull in, about 30 feet of the road. i turn my head to retract the back seats in the cherokee as she softly shrieked and said in a gohstly voice" what the (****)  cms 09/15/11 18:47 cst flg is that" i turned from my attention in the back seat to the vast black non visable dessert in front of the car and eventually saw an orange glowing swinging light, like the one you would see hanging from a chain on a country house front porch . as i stared at this light i noticed it was not a light it was three or s floating in unison. i also noticed that we were parked in front of a mountain. it was only a silloette but the sky above it was amazing, neither of us could get over how big the stars were and this one in particular , bright blue and almost perched atop the siloette peak in the sky. the orange orbs started moving higher than the sway it started as. the orange orb shot to the top of the mountain peak in a millisecond then slowly descended down the mountain when i bright spotlight shot out of the orbs and started scanning the mountain as if it was looking for something, slowly scanning back and forth.As my professional photographer girlfriend broke out her photo equipment and braces her canon 40 d on the dash an begins shooting this phenomenon for hours . we had goose bumps and she. was.  crying. telling me to get. us outta here. i agreed but was. too amazed to move. suddenly the big blue star thing fell out of the sky and morphed into the orange orbs and exploded into colors, all colors that in turn started flying independently and playing with the other colors. all these different colored .....Things flying around the biggest sky i have ever seen, just started to play with each other and they seemed to be communicating . we stayed and watched this event until the sun came up and disappear . as we checked the camera it looked like fireworks, unit she zoomed in on one of the blurry shots, she screamed and dropped the camera. it was a rainbow spectrum entity. i do have the photo but from the ridicule from her friends she erased her memory card but i still have a couple photos. as we left the place we saw signs that said guadalupe mnts state park. when i got home i researched the site we were parked in and it said that we were parked in the crash site of the area 51 spaceship, the photo i have is a rainbow color spectrum light beam that has a face and body of an entity
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flew around playing as if no one was watching

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in august. it was sunset/dusk i was smoking a cigarette and notice this object coming towards the barn. i was memorized on its pulsating features, as i got much closer, i ran in and got my camera. i ended up getting 6 minutes of footage going from dusk to dawn. i feel compelled to get it out. thanks ps i am doing this of my smart phone, video is in ky camera sd card. i have no computer.
content.summary: I observed it for 20 minutes, i have 6 minute footage transitioning from dusk to dark.

content.detailedDescription: Was going to work one morning and was walking up the sidewalk when i saw a silver reflective ball following the electrical lines - it was like a giant ball bearing, slightly bigger than a basketball, solid, but real shiny. i stood and watched as it traveled, not wavering in any way the distance between it and the wires or the pole that held them. if the pole was in the way after following the wire, it would go up and over keeping the same distance. it was beautiful, odd and i had never seen anything like it before or after. it had no string, it wasn't a balloon, there were no seams that i could see and it traveled really slow. i knew it as a ufo, it had to be because we don't have anything like it. i watched it until i couldn't see it anymore. i wanted to follow it but hadn't been on the job very long. you would not have been able to see it in the sky very well because it was so reflective.
content.summary: Silver reflective ball followed electrical lines up and over poles with no attachments.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on my pool deck this morning which is about eye level with my roof. looking out over top of the right side of the house i noticed something round in the sky off in the distance. at first i thought it was a balloon, but kept watching it anyway. as the object came straight at me, it looked very saturn-like. then, it smoothly and quietly shifted direction toward the left at which time i could see it pretty much from underneath. the object was dull gray and triangular from a bottom view but i could see what looked like dividing lines of a darker shade, there was no sound from it at all and no lights that i could see. it was drizzling a little this morning when this happened so i had to be careful not slip as i ran in for my nikon coolpix camera. i remembered that it is important to get a shot of what i was seeing. so, i ran in the house and by the time i came back outside and ran up to the deck again it was behind a tree. i waited a couple of seconds and it came into view again but flying away at this point until i couldn't see it anymore. i took as many pics as i could, one right before it passed behind another tree, four total. it is very hard to get a good photo of things up in the sky! now i understand why all the distorted photo evidence out there! i was disappointed when i uploaded the pics to my computer; they are very distorted. when i zoom in on them all i can see is a circular object. i tried to find a website where i could send them to be enhanced or find software to do it myself because that was all i cared about and came across your site. is there somewhere i can send them to get them better focused and cleaned up? i just want to get a better view of what it was i saw.
content.summary: I saw what i first thought was a balloon. however, as it got closer and smoothly changed direction, i didn't know what it was.

content.detailedDescription:
Hubby and i were camping with the family. we were at huron state campgrounds in summer of 2010. i and hubby had walked down tot he beach area and sat on a picnic table looking out over the water. we were talking and as he turned his head i did after a sec and we first saw what we thought were firworks going off over the trees in huron forest behine the lake we were looking at. but as he was saying "i cannot believe people are out there setting off fireworks".. the lights started up again. first there was 1 the 2 then 3 then 4 and light in this pattern of 1 at a time and as the last one lit up the rest dissapeared only to reapear a little further over to the right in the sky.. same area as the first set just over tot he right more. there were a few other people in the beach area, but it seemed like no one else was seeing these.. they appeared ad fiery red/orange boomerangs. size i could not tell you. but you could see their reflection even off the lake. 

i did contact you folks once before regarding this story and see 1 photo out there that matches what we saw.. which i have not been able to find since then. i did not save the pic (should have!).. if someone knows what these are please share with us!!

thanks for listening, and good luck!
content.summary: Fiery boomerang 4 to 5 in a line, dissapear and reappear

content.detailedDescription: around midnight on dec 25 my girlfriend and i was on our way home after meeting a friend to get a guitar i bought from him. on out way back, the road was very iced over and with snow. we was traveling 25mph or less. as we was going around a right handed curve something on the right side of the road caught my eye. then when my headlights hit the being, it got on its knees and placed its very long and skinny arms on the ground. the arms was 3' or longer in length and maybe 1" around. as we passed the being, it stayed very still, as if it was trying not to be seen. the being was around 5'5" on its knees so standing it would have been over 6' tall. very dark gray, with no fur or hair. the eyes was about 3" and almost round. one thing i thought was strange is when my headlights hit the being the eyes they didn't glow like a deer or other animal. there was two large black bag like items not far from the being. after we passed the being i looked at my girlfriend and asked what the hell was that. she said very fast she didn't want to talk about it. less then a half mile up the road, i turned around and rushed back to try and figure out what it was. when i got back to were the being was it was gone and the big black bag like items were gone with it. it took less then 3 min. to get back where the being was seen. i got out to look and found no foot prints or any sign of where the bag like items was. the snow on the ground was untouched. at this time i got scared thinking the being may be just past the tree line looking at me. so i got back in the car and went home. to this day when i talk about the being my eyes tear up. i really wish i could find out what my girlfriend and i seen, and what the black items was. it has made me be very scared at night when i am alone thinking it may come back.
content.summary: Seen a being while driving.

content.detailedDescription:
Report made 9/15/2011.  event took place in late afternoon, june or july of 1968, in housing area called scarborough farms, a subdivision of 1/4 acre lots/homes in cherry hill, nj.  i had stepped outside to my front yard tending to tend to our dog.  between our house and that or our neighbor, which is about 40' from their front door to our front door, i suddenly saw a large, c. 30' x 15' cigar shaped object, light grey metal, silently hovering between our two houses, about 10' above roof lines.  it had four very large square windows, positioned left to right on the object, each a different pastel color: one each-pink, yellow, green, blue.  all were opaque-i could not see inside.  it was totally silent, and motionless.  i quickly went inside to call my five year old son, to come and see it. he remembers it to this day.  we both had time to watch it together, i waved to whomever was inside it, in a foolish attempt to be friendly, as there was clearly no harm intended to us.  within a few seconds of my waving, it made a silent and extraordinarily rapid ascent off to my right, at about a 50 degree angle up into the sky, until it was roughly about a few hundred feet away.  just as quickly, it made an abrupt turn and ascent to its' left, at about a 90 degree angle and disappeared from view.  the entire ascent time, from the position of hovering to being out of sight was less than 2-3 seconds. the entire experience lasted about 10 minutes.
i immediately went into the house and called the cherry hill police department to report the sighting.  the officer who answered my call was very impatient, and told me to "...Get off the phone, lady.  we've already had over 200 calls reporting it..."
i have waited this long to report it, 9/15/2011, as sightings and ufos are still not an accepted topic of conversation in my circle of friends or relatives.  my son who saw the ufo, is now 48, and a lawyer in columbus, oh, and still affirms that he saw the ufo and knew it to be just that, a ufo.

i report it now because some years later, in 1989, i had another experience while living in dayton, oh, which i firmly believe was an abduction experience.  it troubles me, as i have no way of verifying that it was abduction.  i am now 72, college educated and with some graduate education, and feel that i am not easily fooled by sensationalist thinking.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over houses

content.detailedDescription:
September 14,2011 (9:27-9:37)

i whent out for a walk towards a baseball field that no one suppose to go to after hours(when the sun sets) at about 9:15am. i was walking around admiring the full moon when precisely at 9:27 i notice a faint glimmer of light moving north or towards the bigdiper, it almost looks like a satalite passing by; thats when i notice what looked to be moving stars moving west as the satalite passess by moving north. i counted well over twenty-two star moving the same direction, sum seem to be connected in what looked to be triangle others looked like an octagon,rotating from a 45deg angle to a 180deg were i can clearly see that the lights were conected but not on all of them were, i only notice about tow triangler shaped one and one resembling an octagon. i new that they were moving because i stood sill for about ten minutes watching them move forward, i also saw other "real star" that they pass by under blocking there light.
i looked behind me and i notice other stars it looked like they were trying to catch up with the rest of the fleet. this sorta looked like that video i saw when they recorded well over one-houndred bright orbs that resemble stars appearing and disapearing in broad day light. 

to believe that we are the only intellegent species out here or in our solar system is like being spit on the face, our ancient ancestors left us clues something gunna happen that will change everything.
content.summary: Witness over 22 stars moving west of the bigdiper constalation after observing a faint light that could of bin a satalite

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7:30 pm arizona time i happened to step out front to smoke a cigarette only to discover the most amazing thing i have ever seen.  an extremely bright greenish-blue glowing orb with a tail stream like a meteor was rushing through the sky.  i was facing south at the time.  i first spotted the object to the southwest and it continued for roughly 30 seconds on an eastern course until it flashed red for a second and then completely disappeared. it looked like something burning up in the atmosphere.  but i've seen shooting stars and meteors before and this was like nothing i've ever seen.  it looked huge and it was very bright.  i've also never seen a meteor that was green like this one (although i have heard of their existence).  the object was visible long enough for me to call two of my friends outside who witnessed it as well.
the strangest thing of all was that as soon as i came back inside the house (maybe 5 minutes after seeing the object) i pulled my cell phone out of my pocket and it had mysteriously turned off.  it would not turn back on until i removed the battery and replaced it.  upon turning it back on, the battery life was at 75%, so this was not a case of the phone shutting off due to a low battery.
upon checking out this website, i was glad to see that others had reported a similar sighting in my area.
content.summary: Extremely bright glowing comet-like orb in sky

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7:15 pm, arizona time, i went out my front door to bring up the trashcan. i noticed very bright "neon-green" light low in the sky to my northwest, coming from the direction of phoenix. thought it was a helicopter at first, because it was so low, and too slow moving to be a plane. i proceeded to get the trashcan from around the other side of the garage and returned to my front door. as i turned to open the lid of the trashcan i had been pulling behind me, the bright green light again caught my attention, as it was on a path that was approaching my home, but would pass to the north of it.

as i was noticing that there were still no strobe lights flashing as you see on any other helicopters, a brilliant red light that was smaller than but directly above the neon-green light came on. the red light took about 1/2 second to get to full brightness, then stayed bright for about 3/4 of a second, then gradually diminished over another 1/2 second and went out. the red light continued doing this over and over for as long as i could see it, until both of the lights disappeared over the tops of my neighbors homes.

the bright neon-green light never dimmed or brightened from its original high intensity. when the lights had reached a point slightly east of directly north of me here, they  suddenly "zigged" to a more directly southern direction, and continued that way in a straight line until out of my sight.There was no arc to the turn, it looked more like a ricochet movement, as if they had bounced off of something in the sky and continued on without slowing down. this happened when the red light happened to be at full brightness, and so it was easy to see the sudden change in direction.

the lights never got closer to, nor farther apart from each other as they flew, so i believe the lights were both attached to a single object, but i could not see the shape of it because of the brightness of the lights.

when it was closest to me (about 1/4 to 1/2 mile)at about 300 to 400 feet in altitude, just before the turn to the south, i could see that the green light was much larger than a light on any aircraft could possibly be. i would estimate 25 to 30 feet in diameter. i kept listening for the sound of a helicopter anyway, and heard no noise whatsoever!

i didn't report this or mention it to anyone else, because i had just filed a report (my first to mufon) with you of a sighting i had the evening before. this was a completely different sighting in almost the exact opposite part of the sky, and nothing was the same about it except the brilliant red color.

i felt like "oh no. here we go again! two sightings in two days! now even the people who believed me the first time are going to think i'm nuts!"

by the time i realized this was something strange again, i had no time to go get the camera. believe me, i didn't want to admit that this, too, was something strange i had seen in the sky and couldn't explain normally. that's why i kept listening, almost praying that i would hear the noise of a helicopter. 

when i heard about the similar green lights that have been seen and reported to you several times in the last couple of days in this area, i thought you should know, in case it would help you to know that those people making those reports weren't crazy. it is out there flying around, whatever it is. and whatever it is, it's not something i've ever seen before. and its dead-quiet.
content.summary: Low, bright green object

content.detailedDescription:
This event was about 16 years ago but it had a lasting impact on me. i have vivid memory of the events as if it happened today. i am a single male father with 3 children, 2 were present that day.

we went to experience the military air show at alvin calendar field, naval air base, located on belle chase highway south of belle chase, louisiana. the sky was so bright that day, even with my dark lense sun glasses i could not look up at the sky / flight show for more than about 1 minute, then have to look down and give my eyes a break. thed sky was perhaps the clearest that i have ever see.

1st sighting:
during a sky diving demonstration while looking almost straight up i noticed a quick flash like sun reflection from the corner of my vision which was about 1/2 mile in distance south of the sky divers. i looked and clearly saw 4 metal saucer shaped craft moving slowly parallel to the sky divers. i had to look away monentarily because of the extremely bright sky. when i looked back they seemed to have left the area. i asked everyone around me if they had seen any of these saucer craft but everyone denied seeing anything.

2nd sighting:
across the field where the airport runways are is a tree line. about one hour later i saw 4 saucer shaped craft moving quickly over the tops of this tree line. they seemed to be about 30 to 50 feet above the tree tops and i estimate their speed at about 150 mph. i began to grab people around me and point at these saucer craft to get a wittness that could verify what i was seeing. after showing some 8 to 10 people and the crafts were out of sight, not one of these cowards would say they saw them. i was disgusted and confused with my fellow americans narrow mindedness and lack of a spine.

3rd & final sighting:
the soldiers put on a mock combat landing exercise from several huey helicopters. the huey's came in front of us in a line about 20 feet above the ground. each huey took a turn circling towards us in a fish hoof type pattern then landed, the soldiers quickly jumped off and formed a perimeter with the huey quickly taking off anf flyinf away. as the second huey came around to land i became aware of a saucer craft hovering about 10 feet above the ground directly behind the landing huey. this one was close and very clear to see. i was thinking that this time the craft was so obviously in our face so to speak that everyone simply had to see it.

i don't know if it cloaked or quickly flew away, but as i looked down at my children to tell them about it, aprox. 5 seconds passed, i looked back up and it was gone. i asked if anyone around me wanted to say they did not see that, and everyone denied seeing it.

i have been telling this story to my family for years with no wittness to colaberate it. my daughter and i were going through our old family photos today and she found several pics from that day at the air show. i don't remember having a camera but i think my son was taking the pictures that day. as we started looking at these pics, we could see many unconventional and saucer craft. in one pic my daughter counted 15 of these ufo's.

these pictures are very good quality but the ufo's are small ranging from completely solid metal objects to semi-transparent saucer craft. also, there are some bright orbs that are both trailing and at the front of the blue angels jet aircraft. 

i scanned a few of these pics with my scanner at very high resolution and many of the craft are undemiably there, but others are in need of someone with more skills to clean up the images. i have all the originals that you can take if you wish to have them analyzed and/or cleaned up to bring out the many ufo's that i can't get clear resolution of.

i wish i had seen these pics back when this happened and could have contacted you, but i am offering them to you now.

one additional note: as we were leaving the airfield i struck up a conversation with a usmc security guard. i told him what i saw and asked if they recorded any of these craft on their radar. he became sharp with me and said you did not see anything like that here. 3 other guards walked up and laughed at me and began to ridicule me as if i were a 5 year old child. i am a veteran of the marine corps and know this kind of behavior was totally inappropriate and not tolerated from any marine when i was enlisted.

sincerely;

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Many saucer craft in pics from that day that i never knew were recorded until today.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a green glowing light in the night sky in phoenix tonight. at first i thought it was a green firecracker, but it was flying horizontally. it didn't last long, less than a minute. i've never seen anything like it before. it looked like a green fireball and dissappeared into thin air. i couldn't think of a practical explanation for the object i saw. it was fairly close to where i was standing outside in the backyard. i later looked online and thought maybe it could be a military flare, but i don't know of glowing green military flares. i felt confused and wanted to make sense of what i saw, but i couldn't. i was at my parent's house, but i was the only one outside who witnessed this event. i wished i had it on video but it happened so fast.
content.summary: I saw a green light in the sky in phoenix. it was flying horizontally. it lasted less than a minute. it disintegrated into thin air and dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
The day after charitsmas, on a clear cold night, i took my new ice skates to the ice pond about a block away from home.  nobody was there because it was at night, but there was a lot of moonlight and i could see plenty well enough to skate. i took my boots off and put on my new skates. after skating around for a few minutes, i noticed a light in the sky that didn't quite fit in with the rest of the lights in the sky. i stopped skating and looked directly at it, trying do get an id. it was stationary at first and then it appeared to come directly towards me for about a half a second. then it stopped and hoovered. i could not figure out what it might be. then it started it's manovers. it would excellerate half way across the sky, then stop abrubtly. then it seemed to drop down and swoop up like a bird landing on a branch. then it would streek acros the sky and change directions without loosing it's incredible speed. after about 30 seconds of this, i got very scared and ran home. in fact, i was so scared i forgot to take my new skates off and grab my boots. i ran a block on concrete sidewalks and damaged my skate blades. my mom was ferious about the skates and did not believe i got scared of a light. i did not bring up the subject again.

 i was a student of avaiation and i knew it was not a helecopter, blimp, ballon, satellite, rocket, missle, aircraft, fireworks or anything i could dream up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A light in the sky that manovered like a humming bird for 30 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving kennedy gulch heading northwest on co rd 97 toward conifer and were making approximately 120 degree turn to the left.  my friend saw something in the sky and told me to look, i turned and looked at a 60 degree angle up to my left and saw three lights in a triangular shape. my friend then turned an looked back at the craft and he saw a very large object in the sky hovering over the treetops on the left side of the road.  it then hovered across the road and turned slightly exposing large white blinding lights along with a strange blue and green light on the front of the craft. we were then expecting to see a large explosion or see this craft on the ground as soon as we turned the next right hand corner.  as we turned the corner there was absolutely no sight of the craft, we have absolutely no idea or any explanation of the whereabouts of this strange craft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Unable to describe sighting in less than 25 words

content.detailedDescription:
Today at 12:30pm on 9-13-11 i was sitting at a stoplight in my work truck in shakopee, overcast skys, then i see something. 

i saw a black dot " . " <---that big, in the center of one of the clouds. all of a sudden, it starts moving counter clockwise out of the cloud fairly quick. 
it went around at least four times, then it vanished, but as soon as it was gone, another appeared just below and off to the left. 
it did the same thing, went around counter clockwise four times, then it also vanished. the first one poped up again in the same spot as before, it stopped moving, then out of nowhere, it turned sideways, changed color to a silver and it was big man! it had to be the size of 6 commercial jets, at least! 
looked like the sides were almost at a 85% upward angle, had the dish look to it, then moved back and became a tiny dot again. after seeing this in the matter of 13 seconds, the hair on my arms were standing straight up. as i had to turn on the green light, i saw a third one flying tward the other two, but then lost them all due to trees. 
but wait there is more! i got pissed, i could not see more what was going on, had to do 2 more stops, in my mind i was thinking.. "was that what i think it was??" i got on the highway, i got real close to minneapolis. 65 mph down 35w, i could not believe it but there it was again! straight in front of me! now all i see in front of me is the city, and that black dot, but its getting bigger! i step on the gas to try and get closer, but no luck. now i see it fly straight over the city! just then i thought " that is not a plane" all airplanes here in the city cannot, and will not fly over the city center.
content.summary: Two black dot craft hover turning counter clockwise, then morphs huge.
